Nightlight/TRinity::

Nightlight::

Nighlight left Grounded inside Cr. She moved towards the controls and 
closed the door she and typed the buttons, and the reparation process 
started. Trinity was around still sobbing and thinking that it was 
her fault. 


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Jordan Guthrie <gunthers8@n...> wrote:
> ::Grounded::
> Grounded awoke again not sure where he was. His optic sensors still 
not 
> recieving anything.  Then all of a sudden his whole body shook, or 
so it 
> seemed.  All of a sudden he knew where everything was all around 
him, 
> the bot carrying him, Trinity walking beside him, the walls.  Even 
> though he could not see any of it.  It was there.  Then it dawned 
on 
> him, he had inherited one of the many skills of a mole.  To feel 
> vibrations like no other can.  With his sight now gone this was 
> hightend.  And it felt great.  He was still to weak to do anything 
other 
> than sit and think.  This awoke a memory from thousands of 
century's 
> ago. Of a bot made to destroy organic life, and a bot to protect 
it. 
> And the wars between them. The there was nothing.  Once again he 
entered 
> stasis lock.
